_header: Desine fle narra corrige profer habe
Subjects: transitoriness, of world; sermons, verse in
_description: An exemplum from the Gestis Romanorum in a Latin sermon — one macaronic couplet

CULIi38.Transcription:
Desine fle narra corrige profer habeLet and wep tell and bet
                    hold & haue
